name: ShieldShot
description:
A bullet hell game where you can't shoot.

Engage your shield to deflect bullets back at the enemies, but don't overuse it! Once the shield runs out of energy it will recharge over time.

Try to stay alive for as long as you can!

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow keys 
Activate Shield: Space 
Quit Game: Esc 

Gamepads will work in the main game, use the analog stick to move and any of the face buttons to engage the shield.
